participant_1.background:
My biggest struggle is trying to find balance between my healthy eating habits and my love of drinking.
my adopted dad works at hp.
I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.

participant_2.background:
I went to the beach and played with my nieces.
i love the game halo.
i play many instruments.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
i currently work at mcdonald.

content.text: Hello there, how are you today?
Hello, I am doing very well, how are you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. I just went for a long run and I am excited to see my girlfriend.
That's great, I love going for long runs as well. I actually just got back from the beach where I played with my nieces.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I'm glad you had a good time.
I did, thanks! I'm also a fan of the show Face Off on SYFY.
Oh, I've never heard of that. What's it about?
It's a competition where makeup artists compete to create the most realistic and terrifying special effects makeup. It's really good.
That sounds really interesting, I'll have to check it out.
So what do you do for work?
I currently work at McDonald's, but I'm hoping to get a job in the music industry eventually.
Oh, that's cool. I've always wanted to be a musician.
Me too, but I'm not very good.
Well, you could always teach yourself. There are a lot of resources online.
Yeah, I know. I've been thinking about it.
You should do it! I'm sure you'd be great.
